title: Requires health insurers of workers' compensation claimants to make medical payment pending the outcome if otherwise covered
summary: Requires a workers' compensation claimant's health insurer to pay the claimant's medical expenses in the event such expenses normally covered, pending determination of the claim; requires the provider of medical services to file the appropriate form with the insurer to receive payment.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to payment of medical expenses of claimants by their health insurance carrier
